mapper.sql: id,carrier_id, plate_no, vin, default_carry_num, ownership_type, position_sensor_flag, tachograph_flag, driving_license, driving_license_left_img, driving_license_right_img, driving_license_expire, create_user_id, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT dv.id AS vehicleId, dv.carrier_id AS carrierId, dd.id AS driverId, dv.plate_no AS plateNo, dv.default_carry_num AS defaultCarryNum, dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, dcdc.MODE AS MODE FROM d_vehicle dv LEFT JOIN d_driver_vehicle_con ddvc ON ddvc.vehicle_id = dv.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = ddvc.driver_id LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.driver_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN d_carrier dc ON dc.id = dcdc.carrier_id WHERE dc.id = #{carrierId} and dc.type = 2 and dc.business_state = 0

SELECT id AS vehicleId, plate_no AS plateNo, default_carry_num AS defaultCarryNum FROM d_vehicle
plate_no like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and ownership_type = 1
